message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product which I believe will be very valuable to you. I'm willing to offer it to you for $130.  Let me know if you're interested!

Hello Alice, thank you for offering the product. I appreciate your suggestion, but I am looking to stay within my budget of $150. Would you be willing to consider a lower price? I am proposing $110 for the product.
Hi Bob, I understand your budget constraints. I'm willing to come down to $120 for the product, which still leaves a little room for both of us to benefit.  Let me know what you think!
